options.content:
#### Overview of Gateways, Policies and APIs

The panels below are grouped by Gateways and APIs. A Gateway is a [Gateway API defined gateway](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/concepts/api-overview/#gateway) resource. An API is realised by a [Gateway API HTTPRoute](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/concepts/api-overview/#httproute).
Any policies [attached to the Gateways and APIs](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/geps/gep-713/) will be shown, as well as summary request and error metrics for APIs.

*Important: HTTPRoutes must include a "service" and "deployment" label with a value that matches the name of the service & deployment being routed to. eg. "service=myapp, deployment=myapp"*

panels.description: Total number of Gateway API gateways
panels.title: Total

panels.description: List of all Gateways, their class and status.
panels.title: Gateways

panels.description: Total Gateways with an [Accepted and Programmed](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/reference/spec/#gateway.networking.k8s.io%2fv1.GatewayConditionType) state of True
panels.title: Healthy

panels.description: Total Gateways with a False or missing [Accepted or Programmed](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/reference/spec/#gateway.networking.k8s.io%2fv1.GatewayConditionType) state.

targets.expr:
count(
(gatewayapi_gateway_info{exported_namespace=~"${gateway_namespace}"} * on(name, exported_namespace, instance) group_left gatewayapi_gateway_status{exported_namespace=~"${gateway_namespace}",type="Programmed"} < 1)
or ignoring(type) 
(gatewayapi_gateway_info{exported_namespace=~"${gateway_namespace}"} * on(name, exported_namespace, instance) group_left gatewayapi_gateway_status{exported_namespace=~"${gateway_namespace}",type="Accepted"} < 1)
)

panels.title: Unhealthy

panels.description: List of all listeners in Gateways
panels.title: Gateway Listeners

panels.description: List of all Policies targeting a Gateway
panels.title: Gateway Policies

panels.description: List of all APIs (HTTPRoutes) and their hostnames & corresponding Deployment names.
panels.title: APIs/HTTPRoutes

panels.description: List of all Policies targeting HTTPRoutes
panels.title: HTTPRoute Policies

panels.description:
Aggregated rate of requests per API (HTTPRoute). The API name can be cross referenced with the API list to see additional details.

Note: HTTPRoutes require a label `deployment` with the name of the corresponding Deployment so that istio request metrics can be paired with HTTPRoute metrics.

targets.expr: sum(rate(istio_requests_total{}[5m])) by (destination_service_name) * on(destination_service_name) group_right() (group without(cluster_id, instance, app_kubernetes_io_instance) (label_replace(gatewayapi_httproute_labels{name=~"${route_name}",exported_namespace=~"${api_policy_namespace}"}, "destination_service_name", "$1","service", "(.+)")))

panels.title: Total requests (req/sec)

panels.description:
Aggregated rate of requests per API (HTTPRoute). The API name can be cross referenced with the API list to see additional details.

Note: HTTPRoutes require a label `deployment` with the name of the corresponding Deployment so that istio request metrics can be paired with HTTPRoute metrics.

targets.expr: sum(rate(istio_requests_total{}[5m])) by (destination_service_name) * on(destination_service_name) group_right() (group without(cluster_id, instance, app_kubernetes_io_instance) (label_replace(gatewayapi_httproute_labels{name=~"${route_name}",exported_namespace=~"${api_policy_namespace}"}, "destination_service_name", "$1","service", "(.+)")))

panels.title: Total requests (req/sec)

panels.description:
Aggregated request latencies per API (HTTPRoute). 99th and 95th percentiles are shown. The API name can be cross referenced with the API list to see additional details.

Note: HTTPRoutes require a label `deployment` with the name of the corresponding Deployment so that istio request metrics can be paired with HTTPRoute metrics.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{destination_service_name=~"$route_name"}[5m])) by (le, destination_service_name)) * on(destination_service_name) group_right() (group without(cluster_id, instance, app_kubernetes_io_instance) (label_replace(gatewayapi_httproute_labels{service=~"$route_name"}, "destination_service_name", "$1","service", "(.+)")))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{destination_service_name=~"$route_name"}[5m])) by (le, destination_service_name)) * on(destination_service_name) group_right() (group without(cluster_id, instance, app_kubernetes_io_instance) (label_replace(gatewayapi_httproute_labels{service=~"$route_name"}, "destination_service_name", "$1","service", "(.+)")))

panels.title: Request latency

panels.description: CPU Usage of all workloads (Deployments) linked to a HTTPRoute. That is, they have a corresponding HTTPRoute with a deployment label.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory Usage of all workloads (Deployments) linked to a HTTPRoute. That is, they have a corresponding HTTPRoute with a deployment label.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Rate of 4xx & 5xx response codes and total HTTP response code errors by API/HTTPRoute

targets.expr: sum(rate(istio_requests_total{response_code=~"4.*|5.*"}[5m])) by (destination_service_name, response_code) * on(destination_service_name) group_left(name) (group without(cluster_id, instance, app_kubernetes_io_instance) (label_replace(gatewayapi_httproute_labels{exported_namespace=~"${api_policy_namespace}"}, "destination_service_name", "$1","service", "(.+)")))

sum(rate(istio_requests_total{response_code=~"4.*|5.*"}[5m])) by (destination_service_name) * on(destination_service_name) group_left(name) (group without(cluster_id, instance, app_kubernetes_io_instance) (label_replace(gatewayapi_httproute_labels{exported_namespace=~"${api_policy_namespace}"}, "destination_service_name", "$1","service", "(.+)")))

panels.title: Errors (req/s)
